text:
Trakstar - Seattle. www.trakstar.com/jobs

We're seeking two (2) additional rails engineers.

- Bootstrapped, profitable and proud HR software software company.

- Over 800 b2b customers around the world using our product, mostly in technology, government and professional services segments.

- Our fantastic office is located in the heard of Seattle on Broadway and Pike.

- Growing really fast.

Performance reviews are meaningful in Trakstar because of our innovative ongoing feedback, coaching and recognition tools that users love year-round. (check out this tweet from yesterday: https://twitter.com/evankanouse/status/561912617145344000)

Sound good? We'd love to have you join our awesome team! Please send us your resume & github link to: jobs@trakstar.com
